name: Secret Agent Missions
description:
How much would you be quiet? You can navigate in the house without being caught on camera? Enter the homes of the international spy, you have to collect secret documents.
Do not forget! This house is equipped with high security, cameras, sound wave measuring devices, guards, security officials.

No one appears, you collect confidential documents to enter the house quietly.

Challenging and fun part of each other waiting for you.
